paper.title: Trigram morphosyntactic tagger for Polish
paper.abstract: We introduce an implementation of a plain trigram part-of-speech tagger which appears to work well on Polish texts. At this moment the tagger achieves 9.4% error rate, which makes it signficantly better than our previous stochastic disambiguator. Since the trigram model for Polish behaves similarly to Czech, we hope to reach Czech state-of-art error rate when the quality of the training data improves.
